name: My Awesome Plugin
description: My Awesome Plugin is a really awesome plugin.
author: Me

sections.description: My Awesome Plugin is a really awesome plugin.
sections.installation: Installation of this plugin can be managed from the WordPress Dashboard » Plugins » Add New page by clicking the [Upload Plugin] button, then selecting the myAwesomePlugin.zip file from your computer.
sections.changelog:
Version 1.0.1 – Sep 13, 2022

  • Critical bug fixes.

Version 1.0.0 – Aug 31, 2022

  • Initial public release.
sections.upgrade_notice: This version fixes critical bugs. Please update immediately.
sections.other_notes: myAwesomePlugin is a derivative plugin of and requires installation and registration of {eac}Doojigger
